document_data.name: ''Amulet of Health''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Amulets of health''''' were magical [[amulet]]s worn around the neck that granted the wearer improved vigor and hardiness.
document_data.Description:
Most of these amulets appeared as a golden disk hanging from a chain. The disk usually was engraved with the image of a [[lion]] or other powerful beast. They bore a [[transmutation]] aura of moderate strength.

To craft such an amulet required a skilled spellcaster with the ability to cast the ''[[bear's endurance]]'' spell.
document_data.Powers: ''Amulets of health'' could be crafted at various levels of power, which would enhance the wearer's health by different factors.
document_data.Reputation: Depending on the power of the amulet, such an item could sell for as little as 4,000 [[gold piece]]s or as much as 36,000.
